name: compostjs
description: Composable data visualization library for JavaScript
author: Tomas Petricek

scripts.start: dotnet fable watch src/compost/compost.fsproj --run npx vite
scripts.build: dotnet fable src/compost/compost.fsproj -o dist && rm -f dist/fable_modules/.gitignore
scripts.standalone: dotnet fable src/compost/compost.fsproj --run npx vite build && sh copy-latest.sh
scripts.test: dotnet fable src/compost/compost.fsproj && npx vitest run
scripts.release:standalone: npm run standalone && git add . && git commit -m "Update standalone release file in docs"
scripts.release: npm run release:version && npm run release:standalone && npm run release:publish
